message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a price of $1,150,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this offer reflects a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. This price aligns more closely with my valuation of the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the value of this product to you is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product to you, but I would like to counter with an offer of $1,075,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
